prompt: draw sprint velocity bar chart of closed jira sprints
get all jira closed sprints then draw a bar chart of sprint velocity
get all jira closed sprints details order by 'Sprint'. then draw a bar chart of sprint velocity
get all jira issues assigned to Shahidain, show records in markdown table
jql: assignee = "Shahidain" ORDER BY priority DESC, created DESC

prompt: get all jira issues assigned to Shahidain
jql: assignee = "Shahidain" ORDER BY priority DESC, created DESC

prompt: get details of active jira sprint, display records in markdown table format. do a deep analysis and present it in grouped bullet points
jql: project = SCRUM AND sprint in openSprints() ORDER BY priority DESC, created DESC

prompt: get details of active jira sprint
jql: project = SCRUM AND sprint in openSprints() ORDER BY priority DESC, created DESC
project = SCRUM AND issuetype = Bug AND status != 'Done' ORDER BY priority DESC
project = SCRUM AND issuetype = Task AND assignee = currentUser() ORDER BY priority DESC
project = SCRUM AND created >= startOfWeek() ORDER BY created DESC
